statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT customer_id, item_purchased, price, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history;
SELECT item_purchased, price FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, price ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price) AS total_purchase_price FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchase_price > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT item_purchased, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM customer_purchase_history GROUP BY item_purchased ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT customer_id, item_purchased, price FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 123 AND price >= 50 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, product_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_category FROM preferences WHERE prefered_color = 'Blue';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number='123-456-7890';
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, preferred_category FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.customer_id = preferences.customer_id WHERE preferred_category='Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, address FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT p.name, p.price, o.total_amount FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.product_id WHERE o.customer_id = 3;
SELECT c.name, p.name, p.price FROM customers c JOIN preferences pr ON c.customer_id = pr.customer_id JOIN products p ON pr.category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM categories INNER JOIN products ON categories.category_id = products.product_id GROUP BY category_name
SELECT * FROM order_details WHERE quantity > 5 AND unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price ASC
